dcterms:creator: P.-E. Honnet
A. Lazaridis
P. N. Garner
J. Yamagishi
dcterms:description: The SIWIS dataset contains high-quality speech recordings of a French female professional voice actress reading mainly sentences from parliamentary sessions and French books. It includes around 9 hours of speech and 8,000 sentences, with phoneme transcriptions extracted using a dictionary-based phonetizer.
dcterms:title: SIWIS

dcterms:description: A compilation of 228 French tongue twisters, used to evaluate pronunciation errors in synthesized speech.
dcterms:title: Tongue Twisters

dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 50 sentences used in a listening test to compare the quality and pronunciation of synthesized speech from grapheme and phoneme models.
dcterms:title: 50 Sentences (used in the listening test)
